courseDescription:
Inside this free online course you will learn how to overcome your gluten medical conditions. The first part of this course focuses on gaining a strong understanding of gluten intolerance, celiac disease and other medical conditions associated with gluten. You will also learn how to get started with your gluten-free lifestyle and diet. We will give you many helpful tips on how to do gluten-free shopping too.

You will also be educated on the downside of this medical condition as well as how to start a gluten-free lifestyle. We will show you how to handle dining out and social occasions.  Living with this condition can be hard, so we will give you many strategies on how to be more comfortable with it. We will discuss ways to deal with it emotionally if you are diagnosed with Celiac Disease.

If you are dealing with celiac disease and other medical conditions associated with gluten or have a family member or friend who is dealing with it, this is a great course for you. Health counselors, teachers, parents and people with a family history of gluten intolerance or celiac disease will greatly benefit from this training. This training can help you acquire the basic skills you need to deal with this difficult challenge and avoid common obstacles.

modules.description: Learn why a gluten-free diet is a must for anyone with celiac disease or gluten sensitivity. Discover how technology has destroyed wheat and made it harmful in many ways. You will be trained on how to Get your gluten-free lifestyle started. This section will show you the right to shop gluten-free and get started on a gluten-free lifestyle. Dining out and social occasions can be particularly challenging, so you will be given specific tips and strategies for dealing with these situations.
topics: Wheat and Celiac Disease - The Downside Of Gluten

modules.name: Module
modules.description: A gluten-free diet is popular even among people who aren’t diagnosed with a gluten-related medical condition. A Gluten-free diet can improve health, weight loss and increase energy. To achieve a gluten-free diet, you must avoid wheat and some other grains while choosing substitutes that provide nutrients for a healthy diet. In this section, you will learn how to avoid the pitfalls and emotional obstacles as you shift to a gluten-free lifestyle. You will learn about ADHD, Autism and gluten.
topics: Avoiding The Pitfalls Of Gluten-Free Lifestyle
